Text.Page:
The sheer volume of ossugons around here boggles the mind. Cut their numbers and kill {@LinkCreature:31#1#ossugon frostwalkers} and {@LinkCreature:31#2#icelords}, as well as {@LinkCreature:31#3#frigid ossugons} and {@LinkCreature:31#6#deathfrost cavaliers}.

Report to Dyfed when you've finished.
Good work! Here's a token of our appreciation.
There are ossugons all over the Frost Wastes and Deathfrost Plains.
